backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, radio stream checks, request storage, and push subscription management using maps and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected files, components, and metadata for marquee animation adjustments.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles, behavior, and recent updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes on a failing frontend TypeScript build caused by browser-incompatible Node.js typings in App.tsx.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with PWA metadata, icons, Cast SDK, and a recovery UI shown if React fails to mount.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and shortcuts for Mawalking Radio.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling asset caching, cache versioning, cleanup, and push notifications.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script to detect build issues.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node-based script that verifies TypeScript config, checks for unsafe typings, validates background assets, and inspects service worker settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, audio playback, data fetching, service worker recovery, and global UI elements.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting the audio stream and shows casting status.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt and device-specific install guides with detection logic for iOS, Android, and browser conditions.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Fixed bottom navigation bar with three tabs and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: A compact audio player showing track info, album art, and play/pause controls with click-to-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: A marquee component that scrolls long track titles with motion preferences and interaction-based pausing.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: A slider that controls and reflects the volume of a referenced audio element.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel for enabling and displaying status of push notifications, including subscription workflow and error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Modal form allowing users to submit song or shoutout requests with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner notifying users of app update or load errors with options to refresh or reset the app.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with fallback modal for copying the app link manually.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays show metadata with image, genres, schedule, and click handling using styled card components.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: A red animated badge indicating live status with a pulsing dot and icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: A simple pulsing dot indicator representing on-air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: A notification component that displays track info with styling based on type and supports dismissing.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Provides mock show data and a Show interface describing show structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Hook that attempts to resume audio playback after visibility, focus, or page-restore events and notifies on failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Hooks checks body background-image after mount and logs a warning if missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Provides Chromecast availability, connection, session handling, and media casting logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Stores and toggles a boolean favorite flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Calculates text overflow, scroll distance, duration, and remount key for marquee animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Detects track/mix/live changes and manages browser notification permissions and display deduping.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles subscribing/unsubscribing to push notifications and storing subscription via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for stream URL retrieval, stream availability checks, now playing data, and submitting song/shoutout requests with fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, reset logic, and exposes SW state through a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that pauses audio and allows starting or canceling the timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles requesting and releasing screen wake locks based on activity state and visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and responsive background images for mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a filterable list of mock shows with genre and day selectors and triggers selection callbacks.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Main live radio screen showing header, now-playing info, and play/pause controls with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Expanded now-playing view with album art, track details, playback controls, volume slider, and sleep timer options.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings page providing notification management and background image cache refresh functionality.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Show detail view displaying show info, schedule, genres, and actions like adding the event to a calendar.
Startup diagnostics utility that collects early boot errors and displays a recovery overlay if critical issues occur.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Google Analytics helper functions for safe gtag event tracking, including play, pause, and cast events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a radio show and computes the next show date with proper time formatting. Includes helpers for date conversion to ICS format.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs by handling protocol-relative, relative, and absolute paths, enforcing HTTPS and returning null for invalid inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving persisted values across navigation. Includes helpers for hash-based routing and safe storage operations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, breakpoints, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, features, issues, and a pending request to adjust marquee motion behavior.
